runs.comm: stays back and punches it to the on side
goes back, waits for the turn and plays it wide of mid-on
drops it short and he swivels and pulls him over square leg
turns it down to square leg
down the leg side and there's a sound before the keeper takes it, umpire reckoned that clipped the thigh
flatter delivery and worked to the on side
swing and a miss! Wild shot by Masakadza, Razzak tossed it up, Masakadza was at the crease to slog, played too early, hits the off stump, Mushfiqur's delighted behind the stumps
tossed up and he gets well forward and defends
down on his knee and he sweeps him to fine leg
stays back at the crease and he punches it down to mid-on
this was dropped short, Sibanda saw the length early, went right back and thumped it in front of square, one bounce down to long-on
gets on the front foot and pushes it to mid-on
the first of the chase! Tossed up and he gets on his knee and slogs him high over deep midwicket
this one straightened and nearly took the outside edge
stays back and punches it to the on side
Taylor employed the sweep regularly yesterday, controls it well again, in the air but safely over short fine leg
attempts the reverse sweep and he's hit on the pads
quite stylish! The reverse sweep again, Taylor gets some slid bat on this one and places it well wide of short third man
thrashed! Dropped short outside off, he rocks back and plays a powerful forehand past mid-off
bowls that quicker and he punches it back to the bowler
stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
whips it away to the deep on the on side where the sweeper picks up
he bowls this really quick, manages to keep it away
he gets across his stumps to sweep and he places it to short fine leg, the keeper appeals thinking it was pad first
tossed up really slow through the air and taylor was down to sweep rather early, hit on the body and a confident appeal, outside the line of off maybe
goes back and punches it towards mid-off
Sibanda's striking it hard! Short of a length, Sibanda's been strong off the back foot., slapped that wide of cover
forced wide of cover and long-off comes across and cuts it off
bowling short on this pitch is not recommended, Taylor this time stays back and pulls in front of square

terrible shot by Taylor! This was tossed up and Taylor was down the track to loft him with the spin but failed to get behind the line, lofted it one-handed, it's a skier and an easy catch by Nasir at cover
fuller ball and he gets forward and defends
Sean Williams is rather lucky to survive that lbw! He was down to sweep, the ball hit him on the the thigh plumb in front of the stumps
punches it to the off side
struck on the pads outside leg
punched towards cover
stays behind the line and he punches it to the off side
outside off and he times the punch well wide of backward point, third man sweeps
that was a quick bouncer and Williams awkwardly hooks that almost off one hand, one bounce to fine leg
excellent running! Tucked away softly towards square leg, they take the first run quickly, Sibanda dives and the throw is wide
excellent fielding this time! Sibanda times the punch really well wide of point and Nasir does really well in the deep to save a boundary
another poor shot by a top order bat! Shafiul cleverly takes the pace off the ball, Sibanda doesn't read it, lofts and gets a top edge that swirls towards mid-on and Mahmudullah takes it
tucks it towards square leg
single to long-off
he drops it short and he swivels on the front foot and pulls him wide of deep midwicket
comes forward and drives past short fine leg
goes for the slog but mistimes it to long-on
fires it down the leg side and wide called
down the leg side again and wide called
stays back and punches it towards short third man
that was spanked! Bowls it a fraction too short and he rocks back and slams it wide of deep extra cover
he goes for the reverse sweep and places it straight to point
clips it to midwicket
tossed up and he gets well forward and defends
stays back and gets a thick inside edge to the pads
goes back and cuts with the turn to point
down the track and he withdraws the shot, the ball lobs off the pads and Shakib charges forward to catch but the ball drops short
Raza goes for the slog and he mistimes it to long-on
makes room and tries to slog him but the ball clips the pad
drifts back in and he shuffles and works him away down to fine leg
this was wide outside off and he slashes and misses
drags it short and he swivels and pulls to fine leg
this was short of a length and pulled in front of square, once again not getting the timing right

Direct hit and Williams has to go! Raza pushes the ball down to cover and sets off for a very risky single, Williams was struggling to make it, Robiul throws on the bounce and hits direct at the striker's end, Williams was well short
this was short of a length and he opens the face and steers it to third man
stays beside the line and he punches it towards deep point
stays beside the line and punches it to cover
six to break the shackles! This was dropped short outside off, Raza rocked back and clubbed it high over deep midwicket
stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
expensive over already! This was short and wide outside off, he hops at the crease and smashes it over backward point
pushes it towards mid-off and he has to hurry because fielder underarms the ball to the stumps on the dive
works it towards mid-off
angles it towards short third man and there's an overthrow at the bowler's end
goes back and punches it square on the of side
gets on his knee and sweeps towards square leg
stays back and punches it wide of point
goes back and punches it to the off side
Waller tries to heave that down the ground and he's beaten outside off
Bangladesh chipping away! All quiet at Queens. Razzak fires this one flat outside off, Waller tries to drive that square and it's uppish, Mominul does well to dive to his left and take it
strong appeal for an lbw! Fires that flat and quick, on the back foot and maybe it hit him too high
another quicker one and he manages to defend
quicker one again and he gets a leading edge to the off side
massive! Tossed up on middle and leg and Raza slogs him and the ball disappears behind the trees at deep midwicket
goes right back at the crease and pushes it wide of cover
flatter delivery and he whips it off his pads to the on side
goes back and punches it wide of cover
punched off the back foot and misfielded at backward point
chops it towards point and they take a quick single
batsman walks across to paddle that and he fires it down the leg side
fires that outside off and he punches it to the off side
chipped in the air towards the bowler who leaps but can't get a hand to it
comes forward and gets a leading edge to cover
gets forward and pinches a single to cover
down the leg side and the ball clips the pads as he tries to sweep
gives it more air and he mistimes the slog to deep midwicket
fires in the yorker and he fails to dig it out properly, Mushfiqur could have stumped him but he too fumbled
pushes it down to long-on
Zimbabwe have lost an important one here, Raza made a lot of room to slog that over the on side, Shakib followed him and sprayed it on the pads, the ball deflects off the pads and hits the stumps
fuller delivery and he drags it down to long-on
lands that outside the off stump and he shapes to drive but misses
drives on the front foot wide of cover point and they have to scamper for the second run and the batsman dives at the striker's end
comes forward and drives to mid-off
goes for the big slog and gets an inside edge to the pads
short of a length and he taps it to third man
full on the stumps and he drags it down to long-on
goes for the sweep and the ball lobs off the pads and drops behind the keeper
gets forward and bashes it down to long-off
Zimbabwe sliding towards defeat here, Shingi makes room and goes for the slog, another top edge, well taken by Nasir falling forward at deep midwicket
much slower through the air and he slogs and gets an inside edge past the stumps
Four for the road! Can he take five? Shakib tosses it up slower and Natsai goes for the mighty heave over midwicket, swings too early, hits the middle stump, batsman loses his balance
nope he doesn't get five, fuller delivery and pushed to cover
on the blockhole! That Shafiul yorker was too good for the tailender, swerving in on the leg stump, hits the base and pegs the stump back a little
Shafiul bowls the bouncer, he swivels and gets an outside edge to third man
makes room and the bowler cramps him up for room, he pushes it back to the bowler
another short one and he backs away and hooks, the top edge drops short of fineleg
fires in the yorker outside off, he fails to dig it out
backs away and he swings and misses and it's a comprehensive win for Bangladesh
